body:
Comment 4: 
I can't reproduce this.  Please see if you can create an example
that does not depend on #including external header files.
Start by dropping a copy of the header file where the #include
line is and then delete as much as possible while keeping
the bug.

I installed the libibverbs-dev package in Ubuntu and tried a
few things but it all worked.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
